sources.title: Captain America
sources.description: Title: Captain America Summary: Superhero Captain America battles the evil forces of the archvillain called The Scarab, who poisons his enemies and steals a secret device capable of destroying buildings by sound vibrations. Directed by: Elmer Clifton, John English Actors: Production Company: Republic Pictures (I) Release Date: 5 February 1944 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Superhero Captain America battles the evil forces of the archvillain called The Scarab, who poisons his enemies and steals a secret device capable of destroying buildings by sound vibrations.

metadata.Plot: Superhero Captain America battles the evil forces of the archvillain called The Scarab, who poisons his enemies and steals a secret device capable of destroying buildings by sound vibrations.
metadata.Writer: Royal K. Cole, Ronald Davidson, Basil Dickey
metadata.Actors: Dick Purcell, Lorna Gray, Lionel Atwill
